title: Workplace Health Promotion Situated Learning Program

context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education for office/administrative professionals to address daily health concerns.

learning_goals: Learners can design three immediately applicable workplace health management strategies
Learners can diagnose personal health risks via situational checklists and develop improvement plans
Learners can share health behavior implementation plans with peer learners using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
